key.name: completion-mode
key.summary: When to enable the on screen keyboard's text completion
key.description: Text completion can be disabled. It can be enabled when text input's request and/or manually.

key.name: osk-features
key.summary: Features to enable on all layouts
key.description: A list of features that should be enabled on all configured layouts.

key.name: ignore-activation
key.summary: Ignore requests to activate the OSK for certain applications
key.description: A list of application-ids that are ignored when they request an input method. This means that the OSK doesn't unfold automatically on e.g. text inputs fields in these applications and the user must unfold the OSK via other means.

key.name: recent-emoji
key.description: An array of Emoji definitions to show in the Emoji chooser. Each Emoji is specified as an array of codepoints, name and keywords. The extra integer after this pair is the code of the Fitzpatrick modifier to use in place of a 0 in the codepoint array.

key.name: default
key.summary: The default completer to use. An empty value let's the osk make a pick.

key.name: command
key.summary: The command to use for the pipe based completer. The given command should read the preedit from standard input and output possible completions newline seperated on stdout.
